mapper.select: select x.id_xsl, x.nombre, x.contenido, i.descripcion as idioma from xsls_principales x inner join idiomas i on (x.id_idioma = i.id_idioma) where ( #{id_xsl} is null or #{id_xsl} = x.id_xsl ) and ( #{nombre} is null or x.nombre = #{nombre}) and ( #{id_idioma} is null or i.id_idioma = #{id_idioma})
